explanation:
code_hardening: Added null-safety checks for Program, its title, and the ViewHolder views before binding data; marked local variables as final where appropriate.
resolve_compilation_errors: Added the @Override annotation to onCreate to explicitly override AppCompatActivity.onCreate(Bundle) and ensure correct signature usage; no new APIs introduced.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: none.
refactoring: Applied minor formatting and brace placement adjustments for readability without changing behavior.
misc: Added the @Override annotation and kept logging consistent with the original snippet; no new custom API calls were introduced.
